frameDefinitions: A Vehicle moves into position or otherwise changes configuration or state as preparation for normal operation.
A Traveller boards a Vehicle that they intend to use as a means of transportation either as a passenger or as a driver.
An Entity is judged to be sensually pleasing or intellectually interesting to a (generally implicit) Judge.
A Traveller leaves from or dismounts a Vehicle.
The words in this frame describe situations in which a Perpetrator forcibly seizes control over a Victim's Vehicle to gain some end.  ''
This frame concerns people being in an altered mental state that is induced by an Intoxicant.
frameExamples: The flight for New York finally <t>lifted off</t> from Oakland International with one hundred passengers aboard.
On the 5th of December, 1834, we <t>embarked</t> on board the merchant ship Hellespont.
We saw this <t>beautiful</t> boat with the red sails several times
French farmers have <t>hijacked</t> a lorry and destroyed its load of strawberries.
listRoleDefinitions: The vehicle which moves into position for typical operation.
Any expression which describes the location that the <fen>Vehicle</fen> has been stationed at.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Vehicle</fen> gets ready for motion.
The <fen>Place</fen> describes the location where the <fen>Vehicle</fen> prepares for motion.
The <fen>Traveller</fen> is the entity which boards the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The <fen>Vehicle</fen> is the intended means of conveyance of the <fen>Traveller</fen>.
When the boarding of the <fen>Vehicle</fen> takes place.
The location in which the <fen>Traveller</fen> boards the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which a particular gradable <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
A modifier expressing    the deviation of the implicit value either from the norm or from the value for another <fen>Entity</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular implicit value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular implicit value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The <fen>Traveller</fen> is the entity which disembarks from the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The <fen>Vehicle</fen> is the means of conveyance that the <fen>Traveller</fen> disembarks from.
When the disembarking of the <fen>Vehicle</fen> takes place.
The location in which the <fen>Traveller</fen> disembarks from the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
This is the person (or other agent) who forcibly seizes control over a vehicle to gain some end.
This is the means of transportation which gets under the control of the perpetrator. Example: The terrorists hijacked <fex name='Vehicle'>the plane</fex>.
This role describes the people that are suffering as a result of the <fen>Perpetrator</fen>'s action.
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The mental state of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is changed by an <fen>Intoxicant</fen> .
The <fen>Intoxicant</fen> alters the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s mental experience.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> becomes intoxicated.
listRoleExamples: The helicopter took off <fex>in the afternoon of October 9th</fex>.
At approximately 07:30 hours <fex>we</fex> emplaned in England and after circling to gather other units that made up the 1st Airborne Army, we headed for the Rhine.
When he had mounted <fex>the horse</fex>, his armour glittered in the sun, and he looked so brave and handsome.
Therese entrained <fex>at 9am on 4 October</fex> for the Brandhoek area. .
You can get on the shuttle bus <fex>at the Bank of America across from the BART station</fex>.
<fex>We</fex> got off at the wrong bus stop.
The victim stopped the tractor and dismounted <fex>from it</fex>.
<fex>Yesterday</fex>, we alighted onto this tiny hilly island, site of a Singaporean October festival.
The rebels skyjacked a plane <fex>with 89 passangers</fex>.
